data.name: CreateInfo
data.value: Add a new platform by entering its name, description, and supported automation provider. Use this page to configure a new cloud platform or on-premise solution.

data.name: DeleteInfo
data.value: Remove an existing platform from the system. Deleting a platform will also remove all associated regions, products, and services. Use this page to permanently delete a cloud platform or on-premise solution.

data.name: EditInfo
data.value: Modify an existing platform by updating its name, description, or supported automation provider. Use this page to adjust the configuration of an existing cloud platform or on-premise solution.

data.name: IndexInfo
data.value: Manage cloud platforms and on-premise solutions, including the creation, editing, and deletion of platforms. Easily navigate to configure associated regions, products, and services.

data.name: PageInfo
data.value: Manage you cloud and on premise computer platforms

data.name: ProductCreateInfo
data.value: Add a new product to the platform by specifying its name, label, and category. Use this page to define a new service or resource type for a cloud platform or on-premise solution.

data.name: ProductDeleteInfo
data.value: Remove an existing product from the platform. Deleting a product will permanently remove it from the list of available services and resources. Use this page to delete a product from a cloud platform or on-premise solution.

data.name: ProductEditInfo
data.value: Modify the details of an existing product, including its name, label, or category. Use this page to update the configuration of a service or resource type within a cloud platform or on-premise solution.

data.name: ProductImportInfo
data.value: Import products into the platform by selecting from the full list of available services and resources. Use this page to quickly add multiple products to a cloud platform or on-premise solution.

data.name: ProductIndexInfo
data.value: View and manage the list of products available on the platform. Use this page to create, update, or delete services and resources offered by a cloud platform or on-premise solution.

data.name: RegionCreateInfo
data.value: Add a new region to a platform by specifying its name, label, and description. Use this page to define a new data center region for a cloud platform or on-premise solution.

data.name: RegionDeleteInfo
data.value: Remove an existing region from a platform. Deleting a region will permanently remove the associated data center location. Use this page to delete a region from a cloud platform or on-premise solution.

data.name: RegionEditInfo
data.value: Modify the details of an existing region, including its name, label, or description. Use this page to update the configuration of a data center region within a cloud platform or on-premise solution.

data.name: RegionImportInfo
data.value: Import regions into the platform by selecting from the full list of available data center locations. Use this page to quickly add multiple regions to a cloud platform or on-premise solution.

data.name: RegionIndexInfo
data.value: View and manage the list of regions within a platform. Use this page to create, update, or delete data center regions associated with a cloud platform or on-premise solution.

data.name: ServiceCreateInfo
data.value: Add a new service to the platform by specifying its name, label, and associated product. Use this page to define a new service, including its description, cost driver, and pricing details.

data.name: ServiceDeleteInfo
data.value: Remove an existing service from the platform. Deleting a service will permanently remove it from the list of available offerings. Use this page to delete a service from a cloud platform or on-premise solution.

data.name: ServiceEditInfo
data.value: Modify the details of an existing service, including its name, label, or description. Use this page to update information about a service, including its cost parameters and limitations.

data.name: ServiceImportInfo
data.value: Import services into the platform by selecting from the full list of available services. This function will also create associated service rates and measurement units. Use this page to quickly add multiple services to a cloud platform or on-premise solution.

data.name: ServiceIndexInfo
data.value: View and manage the list of services offered by the platform. Use this page to create, update, or delete services provided by a cloud platform or on-premise solution.
